income_messages:
From: a**************5@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2022-07-12 17:20:02
SUBJECT: Proposal for Project Development/Loan
Sent from: azeezmohammed155@gmail.com
Dear Sir,
We handle project management, assessment, evaluation and due diligence for
several investment,portfolio and asset management companies within the
Middle East.
Currently, we are seeking to attract viable projects and investment
opportunities for possible collaboration and funding by some of the firms
we represent; offering funding and possible collaborations in the form of
loan/debt financing on a 3% interest rate annually.
If this form of funding is within acceptable funding requirements for
projects and investment opportunities you are currently pursuing, we will
make the necessary introductions for both parties to acquaint each other
moving forward.
Kindly confirm the receipt of this notification and your possible interest
to discuss further.
Kind regards,
Mohammed Azeez
Managing Partner
Great Alliance Project Management Services
Al Hudaiba Award Building,
A Block; First Floor, Jumeirah 1
Dubai, United Arab Emirates
From: a**************5@gmail.com
To: hp22770@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-18 14:45:17
SUBJECT: Re: Proposal for Project Development/Loan
Dear Sir,
There are no potential risks
We will be interested in considering a possible collaboration through
project development within your sector if it proves viable after our
review. We are currently financing project developments through
conventional loans of 3% interest rate annually and our possible
collaboration with your firm will be based on this form of funding.
If this form of funding is within acceptable funding requirements for your
project and investment opportunities, we are ready to take this further.
 As part of our procedure for consideration of the project for possible
funding, We'll expect to receive your project's general presentation in the
form of a comprehensive business plan in a compatible format ( PDF
-recommended)  for our review and consideration. If your project as
presented is acceptable and within our scope of funding, we shall thus make
you an offer on very clear and precise terms.
 We expect your project presentation/Business plan to be able to cover the
following functional areas:
 - An introduction of your company and structure or an Introduction of the
project owner/initiator.
 - Historical evaluation of a business plan (if it is an already existing
project or state if it is a new project).
 - Financial structure and analysis to support the investment plan and
proposition as presented.
 - In summary, you should state the total amount in USD or Euros needed to
fund the project in a clearly defined time frame.
We will look forward to further communication as soon as the details of
your project are finalized and ready for our review/consideration for
possible funding.
Sincere Regards,
Azeez Mohammed
Director of Corporate Communication
Dammam Capital Investment Services LLC
Haza bin Zayed Street, Villa-13
Street 28 39625 Abu Dhabi
United Arab Emirates
Web.:  www.dammamcapitalinvestment.com
Email: m.azeez@dammamcapitalinvestment.com
Tel: +971551432984
outbound_messages:
From: hp22770@m**************p
To: a**************5@gmail.com
Time: 2022-07-12 17:20:03
SUBJECT: Re: Proposal for Project Development/Loan
I am really keen to cooperate with you. But is there any potential risks that could effect your company and me?
Best,
Alicia
From: hp22770@m**************p
To: a**************5@gmail.com
Time: 2022-07-18 14:50:11
SUBJECT: Re: Proposal for Project Development/Loan
I am looking forward to this opportunity, though I want to fully know the potential risks and your plan.
Best,
Alicia
